body.name: Mounting Dream TV Mount Fixed for Most 26-55 Inch LED, LCD and Plasma TV, TV Wall Mount TV Bracket up to VESA 400x400mm and 100 LBS Loading Capacity, Low Profile and Space Saving Flat Mount MD2361-K
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 8 hrs 7 mins
FREE delivery February 27 - March 4 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: [ Universal TV Mount ] Fixed TV wall mount designed for most 26-55" flat screen or curved TVs up to 100 LBS. Basic TV mount working with TV/Monitor VESA from 75x75mm to 400x400mm, like general 26, 32, 42, 43, 50, 55 inches Samsung/TCL/LG/Sony/Vizio/Insignia LCD, LED, OLED TVs. Flat TV mount bracket can be installed on 12”, 16'' spacing studs, or brick/concrete wall. Also ok to work as monitor mount. (Concrete anchors sent separately per request). Search MD2361-32 for 24”/32” stud spacing.

[ Low Profile TV Wall Mount ] Narrow gap between this TV bracket and the wall, 1.1” in number, very much of an ultra slim TV mount. Flush TV mount saving space with super sleek look, blending TVs in with any décor.

[ Heavy Duty TV Hanger ] TV mounting bracket with solidly one-piece wall plate, ok to hold TVs up to 100 LBS. Wall mount bracket for TV by advanced auto-welding robot, shaped without any potential human error. (Note: this TV Mount is NOT for drywall alone installation) Search MD2163-K for heavyweights, bigger version of MD2361-K flush wall mount.

[ Easy Wall Mount ] Combined pre-labeled Hardware kit with clear instruction and bubble level, mounting TV brackets in less than 30 minutes. Classic pulling straps lock design for TV quick release or locking. Search MD2351 for an even easier one, a small TV mount.

[Responsive Customer Service] Our US-based customer service experts are available 7 days/week. Welcome to ask them any issue of mounting bracket use and TV wall hanger installation. You are backed up by our leading 10-year support! Please refer to detailed information on the product description to see if this TV wall mount fits your TV from the following aspects: VESA, studs spacing, and possible blocked input.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, quality wall mount.
reviews.reviewText: This wall mount came with everything I needed. I installed it by myself and I’m not usually handy with wall mounts. This one is simple, and comes with more than enough screws/bolts. I purchased 2 and was able to hang both pretty quickly. It has multiple size screws to connect to the back of your tv, each TV was a different size and I had no problems.Great price for a great product!

reviews.reviewText: This is my second time that I ordered this item for a different tv....it's amazing easy to set it on the wall and the instructions are very comprehensive not to mention the price that is very affordable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Our tv fit this mount very nicely. It wasn’t a very easy install though, so I was so thankful that I hired someone who was experienced. My only complaint would be that I wished I had purchased a swivel one.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holds a 55" TV
reviews.reviewText: I just wanted a simple mount that fits close to the wall and something that I could easily remove and remount my television with ease. This mount it so simple to install and I can make easy adjustments to suit my taste.Best mount for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best value on Amazon!
reviews.reviewText: I know what you are thinking. Best value on a simple little mount. How? I have purchased abotu 10 mounts in my life. From pricey $100 mounts at retail stores to cheapo $30 mounts on amazon.Every single one of these mounts seemed like too much for the item. On all of my mounts the metal is cheap with the paint flaking off during installation. The screws feel cheap. The included level is usually a garbage piece of plastic that you just throw away. Marking the right measurement is normally difficult..moving parts feel forced and not very smooth. I always end up saying ugh why are these so expensive.Enter this Mounting Dream kit. It looks solid. It feels solid. It included everything you need and the included hardware is solid. It was super easy to measure for and mount. Even the included little cheapo level seemed well thought out as it is super lightweight, magnetic, and so small it never moved around or fell. I installed a 50" t.v. in a matter of 30 minutes with an impact drill and stud finder.What makes this mount stand out is the brilliant design. It slides left and right about 7 inches leaving room for error. The little straps at the bottom are brilliant, when placing the actual t.v. on the mounted bracket you it literally was as easy as setting it and forgetting it.Even the simple idea of having the logo printed on the frame means you don't even have to ask yourself if it's upside down. Seriously, such a simple yet brilliant design idea.Buy this mount. It doesn't tilt, it doesn't move, it doesn't look fancy..it is just a simple mount that does it's job well. And it was less than the taxes I paid for when purchasing my t.v.!

reviews.reviewerName: Tech, Dogs, Drums and moreTech, Dogs, Drums and more
reviews.reviewTitle: You won't beat this price. Make sure your cables will have room behind the mount.
reviews.reviewText: So when you spend this little on a product your expectations are not the highest. I knew my TV had a 400x400 mount and that it would fit but that this was also the max.So I got out my stud finder, picked the studs I was going to used and got to work. First off, the instructions were decent. I mean, it is pretty obvious, drill 4 pilot holes and lag em in but it is nice that if someone has no skills they can use this. It also tells you everything down to the screw size.It came with a very small level but I used my own for marking the studs which I recommend as the one they included was tiny.I really like how the rails clip on to the mount and are quite secure. I honestly feel like I could hang off of this thing which is good because my 50 inch plasma is heavy.Now the cons.Even with the spacers, this thing is pretty close to the wall. If you have side ports on your TV or a recessed cable area you are OK. When I have the VGA port from my computer in it wont lock into the mount on one of the rails. You could cut a small hole in the wall but just keep in mind if your cables stick out far it's going to be tough. You also have to remove the TV from the mount every time you change a cable, so get it ready with the cables in the back BEFORE you mount it to the wall. I put an extra HDMI cable in there and cable tied it in an area I can pull it down when I need it to not have to remove it later. (it is pretty easy to remove, pull the straps and lift.Over all I give it 5 stars. You cant beat the price and it is secure. Just make sure you are aware how close to the wall it is. You could make your own spacer and go to a hardware store and get 4 longer machine screws for your TV if you were so inclined. A 1/2 inch would make a big difference for your cables.

reviews.reviewTitle: Holds your tv on the wall
reviews.reviewText: These are very basic tv mounts but at the same time there is nothing wrong with them. These feel sturdy on the wall so I don't have a gear of the tv coming down.Easy to install and comes with everything you need, but there is no motion for this mount so make sure you mount it exactly where you want your tv.

Quede muy satisfecho con el producto en general, valen un poco más caros pero valio la pena, se sienten súper bien hechos, buen material y acabados en general, y los seguros para asegurar la tv al soporte traen listones de tela y no se agotan nunca, no cinchos como otros, incluyen un nivelador de burbuja súper utila para la instalación, además de una plantilla en tamaño real e instrucciones completas y claras, se los recomiendo ampliamente
This was a gift easy to install came with lots of hardware. Would definitely recommend.

La instalada fue fácil (pero ya tengo práctica haciendo hoyos en la pared 😁).La television es fácil de quitar y volver a poner con este soporte, con cinchos acomode los cables en los herrajes que van en la televisionla television luce bien y se ahorra mucho espacio al estar empotrada.Me apoye de un nivel de burbuja más grande, ya que el que trae es pequeño
